job_description: As an AI Agent Engineer II, you will be responsible for designing and implementing AI-driven solutions that enhance customer service experiences. You will work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to develop and optimize AI models, focusing on natural language processing and machine learning techniques to improve the performance and capabilities of our customer support systems.
key_requirements: Proven experience in building and deploying machine learning models.
Strong understanding of NLP techniques and frameworks.
Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams effectively.
Solid programming skills in Python or similar languages.
